ai-snp2.1:1.1_0: Whatever beings have come together here,
ai-snp2.1:1.2_0: on the ground or in the sky,
ai-snp2.1:1.3_0: may beings all be of happy heart,
ai-snp2.1:1.4_0: and listen carefully to what is said.
ai-snp2.1:2.1_0: Therefore, all of you beings, be attentive,
ai-snp2.1:2.2_0: be friendly towards this generation of men,
ai-snp2.1:2.3_0: who day and night bring offerings;
ai-snp2.1:3.1_0: There’s no wealth here or beyond,
ai-snp2.1:3.2_0: or in the heavens - that excellent treasure
ai-snp2.1:3.3_0: is not equal unto the Realised One -
ai-snp2.1:3.4_0: this excellent treasure is in the Buddha:
ai-snp2.1:3.5_0: by virtue of this truth may there be safety!
ai-snp2.1:4.1_0: Ending, dispassion, the undying, the sublime,
ai-snp2.1:4.2_0: attained by the Sakyan Sage immersed in samādhi;
ai-snp2.1:4.3_0: there is nothing equal to that Dhamma.
ai-snp2.1:4.4_0: This sublime gem is in the Dhamma:
ai-snp2.1:4.5_0: by virtue of this truth may there be safety!
ai-snp2.1:5.1_0: The purity praised by the highest Buddha,
ai-snp2.1:5.2_0: the concentration said to have immediate (result) -
ai-snp2.1:5.3_0: no equal to that concentration is found -
ai-snp2.1:5.4_0: This sublime gem is in the Dhamma:
ai-snp2.1:5.5_0: by virtue of this truth may there be safety!
ai-snp2.1:6.1_0: The eight individuals praised by the good,
ai-snp2.1:6.2_0: are the four pairs of the Holy One’s disciples;
ai-snp2.1:6.3_0: they are worthy of religious donations,
ai-snp2.1:6.4_0: what’s given to them is very fruitful.
ai-snp2.1:6.5_0: This sublime gem is in the Saṅgha:
ai-snp2.1:6.6_0: by virtue of this truth may there be safety!
ai-snp2.1:7.2_0: Gotama’s teaching, being free from sense desire -
ai-snp2.1:7.3_0: having attained and entered the deathless -
ai-snp2.1:7.4_0: and enjoy the quenching they’ve freely gained.
ai-snp2.1:7.5_0: This sublime gem is in the Saṅgha:
ai-snp2.1:7.6_0: by virtue of this truth may there be safety!
ai-snp2.1:8.2_0: is not shaken by the four winds,
ai-snp2.1:8.3_0: just like this, I say, is the person who is true,
ai-snp2.1:8.4_0: the one who sees the noble truths completely -
ai-snp2.1:8.5_0: This sublime gem is in the Saṅgha:
ai-snp2.1:8.6_0: by virtue of this truth may there be safety!
ai-snp2.1:9.1_0: Those who fathom the noble truths
ai-snp2.1:9.2_0: taught by the one of deep wisdom,
ai-snp2.1:9.3_0: do not take an eighth life,
ai-snp2.1:9.4_0: even if they are hugely negligent.
ai-snp2.1:9.5_0: This sublime gem is in the Saṅgha:
ai-snp2.1:9.6_0: by virtue of this truth may there be safety!
ai-snp2.1:10.2_0: there are three things that are given up:
ai-snp2.1:11.1_0: They’re freed from the four places of loss,
ai-snp2.1:11.2_0: and unable to perform the six grave crimes.
ai-snp2.1:11.3_0: This sublime gem is in the Saṅgha:
ai-snp2.1:11.4_0: by virtue of this truth may there be safety!
ai-snp2.1:12.1_0: Even if they do a bad deed
ai-snp2.1:12.2_0: by way of body, speech, or mind,
ai-snp2.1:12.3_0: they are unable to conceal it;
ai-snp2.1:12.4_0: they say this inability applies to one who has seen the truth.
ai-snp2.1:12.5_0: This sublime gem is in the Saṅgha:
ai-snp2.1:12.6_0: by virtue of this truth may there be safety!
ai-snp2.1:13.1_0: Like a tall forest tree crowned with flowers
ai-snp2.1:13.2_0: in the first month of sumer;
ai-snp2.1:13.3_0: that’s how he taught the superb Dhamma,
ai-snp2.1:13.4_0: leading to quenching, the ultimate benefit.
ai-snp2.1:13.5_0: this excellent treasure is in the Buddha:
ai-snp2.1:13.6_0: by virtue of this truth may there be safety!
ai-snp2.1:14.1_0: The best one, knowing the best, gave the best, brought the best,
ai-snp2.1:14.3_0: this excellent treasure is in the Buddha:
ai-snp2.1:14.4_0: by virtue of this truth may there be safety!
ai-snp2.1:15.1_0: The old is ended, nothing new is produced.
ai-snp2.1:15.2_0: their minds have no desire for future rebirth.
ai-snp2.1:15.3_0: Withered are the seeds, there’s no desire for growth,
ai-snp2.1:15.4_0: those wise ones are extinguished just like this lamp.
ai-snp2.1:15.5_0: This sublime gem is in the Saṅgha:
ai-snp2.1:15.6_0: by virtue of this truth may there be safety!
ai-snp2.1:16.1_0: Whatever beings have come together here,
ai-snp2.1:16.2_0: on the ground or in the sky,
ai-snp2.1:16.3_0: we (all) revere the realised Buddha who is
ai-snp2.1:16.4_0: We bow to the Buddha! May you be safe!
ai-snp2.1:17.1_0: Whatever beings have come together here,
ai-snp2.1:17.2_0: on the ground or in the sky,
ai-snp2.1:17.3_0: we (all) revere the realised Buddha who is
ai-snp2.1:17.4_0: We bow to the Dhamma! May you be safe!
ai-snp2.1:18.1_0: Whatever beings have come together here,
ai-snp2.1:18.2_0: on the ground or in the sky,
ai-snp2.1:18.3_0: we (all) revere the realised Buddha who is
ai-snp2.1:18.4_0: We bow to the Saṅgha! May you be safe!
